ai-anya-e0605n29:4_0: Having honoured by those who are restrained,
ai-anya-e0605n29:8_0: and mindfulness its ownership is concentration.
ai-anya-e0605n29:12_0: having given up greed, hate and delusion,
ai-anya-e0605n29:13_0: having gone beyond doubt and uncertainty,
ai-anya-e0605n29:14_0: I will proclaim the fisherman’s call out,
ai-anya-e0605n29:17_0: I’d be no deceit or foster,
ai-anya-e0605n29:18_0: From what is given to them,
ai-anya-e0605n29:19_0: and my body became full of honey.
ai-anya-e0605n29:25_0: I do build a self-control and restraint,
ai-anya-e0605n29:29_0: But when I received this discourse,
ai-anya-e0605n29:30_0: This is the Buddha, this very thing.
ai-anya-e0605n29:32_0: free of the world in the world,
ai-anya-e0605n29:35_0: Having gone to the strength of continued existence,
ai-anya-e0605n29:37_0: my head is like a bowl restrained in my hand.
ai-anya-e0605n29:39_0: standing in the truth, having reached the truth,
ai-anya-e0605n29:40_0: All life for one should be restrained towards a life-span,
ai-anya-e0605n29:42_0: The great duties, after performing a great sacrifice,
